sentence: Arizona Senator Mark Kelly and New Hampshire Senator Maggie Hassan proposed a pause on the federal gas tax, as the average price for a gallon of gas in the U.S. is over $3.45 a gallon, according to AAA, and could even rise higher.
author: Katie Wermus
title: With Gas Prices Averaging $3.45 a Gallon, 2 Senators Propose Halting Tax

sentence: She added that "so-called moderate" Sen. Mark Kelly of Arizona is in a similar spot.
title: Ingraham: US voters await 'payback time' against Biden, liberals for meritless mandates

sentence: The incumbent is Sen. Mark Kelly, a Democrat.
author: Brian Trusdell
title: Arizona AG Brnovich to Newsmax: Biden Admin Intentionally Undermining Law
